categories.name: Lighting
categories.description: The lighting style used in your scene.

options.name: Natural
options.promptText: lit with overcast natural lighting,

options.name: Golden Hour
options.promptText: in beautiful golden hour lighting,

options.name: Blue Hour
options.promptText: in the very early morning lit with blue hour lighting,

options.name: Studio
options.promptText: lit with professional studio lighting for a clean and sharp image,

options.name: Soft
options.promptText: lit with diffused lighting creating soft shadows,

options.name: Hard
options.promptText: lit with hard lighting creating strong defined shadows,

options.name: Three Point
options.promptText: lit with 3-point studio lighting,

options.name: Split
options.promptText: lit with split lighting hiding one side in shadow for intense contrast,

options.name: Rembrandt
options.promptText: lit with rembrandt lighting,

options.name: Silhouette
options.promptText: lit from behind creating a strong silhouette,

options.name: Top
options.promptText: lit only with top-down lighting creating strong shadows on the neck,

options.name: Under
options.promptText: illuminated exclusively by a harsh single light source from below its chin, forming eerie under-lighting and casting sharp shadows on cheeks and forehead,

options.name: Dramatic
options.promptText: illuminated by dramatic lighting for intense contrast,

options.name: Night
options.promptText: at night illuminated by stars and moonlight,

options.name: Flat
options.promptText: lit with flat, even lighting from the front with both sides in equal brightness, no shadows,

options.name: Volumetric
options.promptText: illuminated by streams of hazy volumetric god-rays,

categories.name: Environment

options.name: Neutral Tones

options.name: Vibrant Colors
options.promptText: with a vibrant palette, featuring bold and saturated hues,

options.name: Neon Glow

options.name: Holographic

options.name: Cinematic Teal and Orange

options.name: Vintage Colors
options.promptText: with a vintage-inspired palette, featuring faded yellows, greens, and sepia tones,

options.name: Cyberpunk
options.promptText: with a cyberpunk palette, featuring neon pinks, purples, and electric blues,

options.name: Pastels
options.promptText: with a soft pastel palette, featuring light pinks, blues, and yellows,

options.name: Muted Colors
options.promptText: with muted tones, using desaturated and subtle shades and low contrast,

options.name: Earth Tones
options.promptText: with earth tones, inspired by nature with browns, greens, and ochres,

options.name: Red and Blue Split
options.promptText: in a bold red and blue split color scheme, creating dramatic contrasts,

options.name: Complementary Colors
options.promptText: with complementary colors, using opposites on the color wheel for striking contrasts,

options.name: Analogous Colors
options.promptText: with an analogous palette, featuring colors adjacent on the wheel for harmony,

options.name: High Contrast
options.promptText: with a high-contrast palette, combining bright and dark tones for dramatic effect,

options.name: Warm Colors
options.promptText: with a warm color palette, featuring reds, oranges, and yellows,

options.name: Cool Colors
options.promptText: with a cool color palette, featuring blues, greens, and purples,

options.name: Fiery Tones
options.promptText: with fiery tones, dominated by vibrant reds, oranges, and yellows,

options.name: Oceanic Colors
options.promptText: with oceanic colors, featuring deep blues, turquoise, and seafoam greens,

categories.name: Camera & Film
categories.description: These won't provide precise emulations, but can help provide a general feel.

options.name: RED Cinema Camera
options.promptText: shot on a RED cinema camera, capturing high-resolution, cinematic quality,

options.name: Arri Alexa
options.promptText: shot on an Arri Alexa camera, delivering crisp detail and beautiful graining,

options.name: DSLR Camera
options.promptText: shot on a professional DSLR camera with crisp details and dynamic range,

options.name: Mirrorless Camera
options.promptText: shot on a mirrorless camera, known for compact design and sharp imagery,

options.name: GoPro
options.promptText: shot on a GoPro, with wide angles and action-ready clarity,

options.name: Drone Camera
options.promptText: captured with a drone camera, offering sweeping aerial perspectives,

options.name: iPhone
options.promptText: shot on an iPhone, delivering clean, vibrant, and modern visuals,

options.name: Kodak Portra 400
options.promptText: shot with Kodak Portra 400 film, known for warm tones and fine grain,

options.name: Kodak Ektar 100
options.promptText: shot with Kodak Ektar 100 film, producing vivid colors and sharp details,

options.name: Fujifilm Velvia 50
options.promptText: shot with Fujifilm Velvia 50 film, renowned for rich saturation and contrast,

options.name: Ilford HP5 Plus
options.promptText: shot with Ilford HP5 Plus film, a classic black-and-white film with fine grain,

options.name: Cinestill 800T
options.promptText: shot with Cinestill 800T film, capturing cinematic tungsten tones,

options.name: Polaroid Instant Film
options.promptText: captured on Polaroid instant film, delivering vintage, soft-focus charm,

options.name: 16mm Film
options.promptText: shot on 16mm film, with grainy textures and a nostalgic vibe,

options.name: 35mm Film
options.promptText: shot on 35mm film, offering rich details and classic cinematic quality,

options.name: IMAX Camera
options.promptText: shot on an IMAX camera, delivering unparalleled detail and scale,

options.name: Super 8 Film
options.promptText: shot on Super 8 film, with nostalgic grain and soft colors,

options.name: Pinhole Camera
options.promptText: captured with a pinhole camera, creating soft edges and unique distortions,

options.name: Infrared Photography
options.promptText: captured with infrared photography, producing surreal tones and contrasts,

options.name: Tilt-Shift Lens
options.promptText: shot with a tilt-shift lens, creating miniature-like depth of field effects,

options.name: Fisheye Lens
options.promptText: captured with a fisheye lens, distorting perspective with wide, circular visuals,

categories.name: Post Effects
categories.description: A variety of effects for post-processing for subtle adjustments and creative styles.

options.name: Bokeh
options.promptText: with a beautiful bokeh effect, featuring soft, blurred background highlights,

options.name: Motion Blur
options.promptText: with dynamic motion blur, emphasizing speed and movement,

options.name: Depth of Field
options.promptText: with a shallow depth of field, focusing sharply on the subject while blurring the background,

options.name: Gaussian Blur
options.promptText: with a subtle Gaussian blur for a soft and dreamy effect,

options.name: Vignette
options.promptText: with a vignette effect, darkening the corners of the image for a classic look,

options.name: Chromatic Aberration
options.promptText: with chromatic aberration, creating a colorful halo around light sources,

options.name: Lens Flare
options.promptText: with a cinematic lens flare, adding streaks of light for a dramatic effect,

options.name: Glow Effect
options.promptText: with a radiant glow around the subject, creating a luminous aura,

options.name: Halo Effect
options.promptText: with a soft halo effect around the subject, adding a mystical glow,

options.name: Dust and Scratches
options.promptText: with dust and scratches for a retro, worn-out look,

options.name: Glitch Effect
options.promptText: with a glitch effect, distorting the image with digital noise and color shifts,

options.name: Double Exposure
options.promptText: with a double exposure effect, blending two overlapping images,

options.name: Kaleidoscope Effect
options.promptText: with a kaleidoscope effect, creating intricate mirrored patterns,

options.name: Pixelation
options.promptText: with a pixelated effect, giving the image a retro, low-resolution look,
